channel.title: TIL on Manuel Martinez
channel.description: Recent content in TIL on Manuel Martinez

item.title: Recommender Systems: What are they?
item.description: This is the first post in what I plan to be a series of very basic introductions to recommendation engines, and the most basic ones at that. I am by no means an expert, or even a middling practitioner, but just a neophyte, so the series will not be exhaustive. The real purpose of these posts is to learn by explaining, but also to allow you to hit the ground running if you want to set up a basic recommendation system for your purposes.
